Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

Interface ILicenseManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CastLabsLicenseManager, LicenseManager
    public interface ILicenseManager
    Interface to the License Manager. The License Manager is used to retrieve and store licenses so that Assets can be played back whilst offline. A default implementation is provided by LicenseManager. The LicenseManager class should be extended to override the getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset method.
    See Also:
    LicenseManager

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int WIDEVINE_LICENSE_FLAG
      Integer used to specify the widevine license type.

    • Field Detail

      • WIDEVINE_LICENSE_FLAG

        static final int WIDEVINE_LICENSE_FLAG
        Integer used to specify the widevine license type.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • withAsset

        ILicenseManager withAsset​(IAsset asset)
        Set the asset that requires a license. This allows generation of request properties from the asset if needed.
        Parameters:
        asset - The asset that requires the license.
        Returns:
        The License Manager.

      • withAssetId

        ILicenseManager withAssetId​(String assetId)
        Set the remote id of the asset that requires a license. This allows generation of request properties from the asset if needed. The id can be used to generate license requests if an IAsset has not yet been added to the SDK.
        Parameters:
        assetId - The asset id from your catalog.
        Returns:
        The License Manager.

      • getLicenseAcquistionUrl

        String getLicenseAcquistionUrl()
        Retrieve the URL for requesting the assets license. This method needs to be overridden by customers. It should return the complete URL for requesting the license. That is; it should return the the license server url plus any query parameters that are needed by the licensing server to grant the license.
        Returns:
        The Url to be used when requesting the license.

      • executeKeyRequest

        byte[] executeKeyRequest​(UUID uuid,
                         MediaDrm.KeyRequest request)
                  throws IOException
        Request the key from the licensing server.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the drm scheme.
        request - The request data.
        Returns:
        The key requests response data.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an IO issue is encountered during the request due to network.

      • executeProvisionRequest

        byte[] executeProvisionRequest​(UUID uuid,
                               MediaDrm.ProvisionRequest request)
                        throws IOException
        Executes a provisioning request.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the content protection scheme.
        request - The request.
        Returns:
        The response data.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred executing the request.

      • getKeyRequestProperties

        Map<String,​String> getKeyRequestProperties()
        Map of header properties that should be added to the request.
        Returns:
        Map of request properties.

      • supportedLicenseFlags

        int supportedLicenseFlags()
        Retrieve the flags of supported license schemes.
        Returns:
        The flags.

      • saveKey

        boolean saveKey​(Context context,
                String cacheId,
                byte[] keyset)
        Save the key set Id so license can be retrieved when offline. Either the asset or the assetId must have been set with withAsset(IAsset) or withAssetId(String) for the save to be successful.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use for saving the key.
        cacheId - The id to be used by the offline cache.
        keyset - The key set ID.
        Returns:
        true if the key was saved.

      • removeKey

        void removeKey​(Context context,
               String cacheId)
        Removes the key set Id from the keyset cache.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use when deleting the keys.
        cacheId - The id used to identify the keyset in the cache.

      • removeKeys

        void removeKeys​(Context context)
        Delete all keys for the asset that was set with withAsset(IAsset) or that was identified with withAssetId(String).
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use when deleting the keys.

      • removeAllKeys

        void removeAllKeys​(Context context)
        Delete all keys we have stored in the SDK.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use when deleting the keys.

      • getKeys

        List<byte[]> getKeys​(Context context)
        Get the keyset ids stored for a particular asset. Either the asset or the assetId must have been set with withAsset(IAsset) or withAssetId(String)
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use when retrieveing the keys.
        Returns:
        The keys for the asset.

      • getKey

        byte[] getKey​(Context context,
              String cacheId)
        Retrieves the keysetId from the cache.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use when retrieving the key.
        cacheId - The Id of the key within the cache
        Returns:
        The keyset id or null.
